scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n API,WEB "python -m uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload" "npm --prefix frontend run dev -- -p 3000"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -n API,WEB "python -m uvicorn backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "npm --prefix frontend run start -- -p $PORT"
